title: Zoo Family. - Volume 1.
creator_credit: Chris Sheil, Howard Neil and Crawford Productions
brief_description: Filmed on location at the Melbourne Zoological Gardens and each adventure revolves around the Mitchell family who live in the zoo. Dr Mitchell is the zoo vet and his children Nick and Susie help out. The real stars however are the animals who feature throughout.
creator_credit_for_label: Chris Sheil, Howard Neil and Crawford Productions
